mapper.select: SELECT DRAMA_NO, DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_CHANNEL, DRAMA_GENRE, DRAMA_DIRECTOR, DRAMA_CONTENT, DRAMA_READCOUNT, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE, DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE, DRAMA_EPISODE, DRAMA_GRADE, r FROM (SELECT DRAMA_NO, DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_CHANNEL, DRAMA_GENRE, DRAMA_DIRECTOR, DRAMA_CONTENT, DRAMA_READCOUNT, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE, DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE, DRAMA_EPISODE, DRAMA_GRADE, ROWNUM r FROM DRAMA ORDER BY DRAMA_READCOUNT DESC ) WHERE r >= 1 AND r <= 8
